titleStmt.title: A second summons to the city of Abel, 2 Sam. 20 to deliver up Sheba, the son of Bichri, that man of Belial : by way of metaphor, alluding to the Quakers and Geo. Whitehead and may serve for a reply to their answer to my printed sheet, stiled The Quakers Yearly Meeting impeached, &c.
titleStmt.author: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by John Gwillam ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
